title: Trump fires acting attorney general for refusing to defend legality of his refugee ban
text: The president has wide power over immigration. Federal law says he can "suspend the entry of all aliens or any class of aliens" if he finds them to be "detrimental" to the country's interests. The same law, however, also says that "no person shall receive any preference or priority or be discriminated against in the issuance of an immigrant visa because of the person's race, sex, nationality, place of birth, or place of residence."
summary:
